Company: Children's Hospital and Children's National Medical Center Inc.
Description: Children's Hospital, Children's National Medical Center Inc. and its affiliated entities agreed to pay $12.9 million to resolve allegations that they violated the False Claims Act by submitting false cost reports and other applications to the components and contractors of the Department of Health and Human Services, as well as to Virginia and District of Columbia Medicaid programs.

Agency: District of Columbia Department of Energy & Environment
Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on January 13, 2021 in response to an open records request.
